alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 24 at 6:48AM HST until April 25 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ..HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI NIIHAU OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH TONIGHT... .A new northwest swell will build through the day and peak this evening, then gradually lower on Tuesday. Buoy observations indicate that the swell is several feet larger than initially expected. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 12 to 16 feet along north facing shores, and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. Know your limits. When in doubt, don`t go out.
